subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When a team is undefeated and ranked No. 2 in the nation, there are no exposed warts. But lose a game the way No. 2 Auburn did to Arkansas, and the blemishes are revealed in a hurry.
snippet: When a team is undefeated and ranked No. 2 in the nation, there are no exposed warts. But lose a game the way No. 2 Auburn did to Arkansas, and the blemishes are revealed in a hurry.
